Functions

uint32_t hashlittle (const void *key, size_t length, uint32_t initval)
 hash the data and return an hash number.

Detailed Description

contains a hash function used to hash a chunk of data and return a hash number that can be used to identify the data.

Apply with care to double floating numbers because of round off error.

Function Documentation
